author: taylor
msg: Here is a continuation of the Database Registry implementation.
I started on a registry database service a long time ago, and then became sidetracked, and never got back to it.
Suchi (Suchisubhra Sinha) has picked up where I left off, and we now have the starts of a working impl.

author: taylor
msg: Bug fix 26874 - broken manageDB script with space in classpath

author: taylor
msg: The Redirect portlet is a new portlet to enable Jetspeed menu options to redirect outside of the portal
You may need to tweak the clearing of the js_pane state in Jetspeed's menus depending on the level
of menus where this portlet is located.
To test it out try redirecting, and then hitting the back link and ensure that all links are still go
Also try going back to http://localhost:8080/jetspeed/portal and ensure that you arent getting infinite redirects
